business_strategies.strategy: Provide complete templates and step-by-step processes to remove barriers for beginners

problems_solutions.problem: Building AI chatbots requires coding skills that many entrepreneurs lack
problems_solutions.solution: Use no-code platforms with pre-built templates

problems_solutions.problem: Client feedback processes are messy and time-consuming for AI agencies
problems_solutions.solution: Implement dedicated client feedback mode with structured feedback pages

startup_ideas.idea: AI Market Research Assistant using persona-based agents

mistakes_to_avoid.mistake: Thinking you need coding skills to build AI solutions

growth_tactics.tactic: Build large community and showcase member success stories

steps: User sends question to master agent
Master agent sends to Relevance AI tool
Relevance AI distributes to 3 persona agents
Each persona responds based on their profile
